<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <entry>10494/107017</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107017</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085905</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Classroom routines and procedures</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Klassenzimmerprogramme und -prozeduren</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sous-programmes et procédures de salle de classe</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Rotinas e procedimentos da sala de aula</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Procedure e procedure dell'aula</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ρουτίνες και διαδικασίες τάξεων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Rutinas y procedimientos de la sala de clase</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Establishing clear classroom routines and procedures is necessary for ensuring that your classroom runs smoothly.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Freie Klassenzimmerprogramme und -prozeduren 
herzustellen ist für das Sicherstellen notwendig, daß Ihr 
Klassenzimmer glatt läuft.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">L'établissement des sous-programmes et des 
procédures clairs de salle de classe est nécessaire pour s'assurer 
que votre salle de classe fonctionne sans à-coup.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estabelecer rotinas e procedimentos desobstruídos
da sala de aula é necessário para assegurar-se de que sua sala de 
aula funcione lisamente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La stabilizzazione le procedure e delle procedure 
libere dell'aula è necessaria per accertarsi che la vostra aula 
funzioni uniformemente.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η καθιέρωση των σαφών ρουτινών και των διαδικασιών 
τάξεων είναι απαραίτητη για την εξασφάλιση ότι η τάξη σας 
τρέχει ομαλά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Establecer rutinas y procedimientos claros de la 
sala de clase es necesario para asegurarse de que su sala de clase se 
ejecuta suavemente.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765085905</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
          <contribute>
            <role>

              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>BEGIN:VCARD
VERSION:3.0
N:OERCommons
FN:OERCommons
ORG:OERCommons
END:VCARD</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="x-t-cc-url">http://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/3.0/</string>
            <string language="en">Creative Commons Attribution-Noncommercial-Share Alike 2.5</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107017</entry>
